description.value:
Your friendship with animals mystically deepens. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain proficiency in the Animal Handling skill. If you're already proficient in it, your proficiency bonus is doubled for any check you make with it.
  • You learn the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.aL1F8fvYLtNzUbKu]{Speak with Animals} spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. You also learn the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.hDOENzjuj5WpLq7B]{Animal Friendship} spell, and you can cast it once with this feat, without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
